Posts.Content: Hi all Back for results today following Partial mastectomy and sentinal node biopsy. Margins good in lump however has spread to one node. It is Invasive stage 3 and am booked in now on 17th Jan for Auxillary clearance. Then will start 6-9 months of chemotherapy followed by radiotherapy and finally hormone therapy i believe. So much to take in!!! Have to think of leaving work a new job since september and a job I love. It is a 3 year programme so as time is limited and I am the coordinator I think I will have to be replaced due to illhealth and I can understand that as i want it to work. Financially i am panicking and I don't want to put pressure on my husband as he has only just got this job after redundancy and its an agency post so no guarantees. some good information and will be contacting macmillan for advice on benefits etc on monday. My journey is just beginning........ here goes
Posts.Title: not the news I wanted today!!

Posts.Content: Thank you Helen I won't do anything rash. I have already been referred to Macmillan helpline and have made contact but needed to know the outcome of results before advising. I will contact them again on monday.  andrea x
